title: Home Page
mainText: Welcome to the website on the United Nations' sustainable development goals (SDG) for climate change.

mainContentPages.imageAlt: Red logo of an eye with a globe inside
mainContentPages.title: Climate Action
mainContentPages.desc: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.

mainContentPages.imageAlt: Blue logo of a fish underwater
mainContentPages.title: Life Below Water
mainContentPages.desc: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

mainContentPages.imageAlt: Green logo of a tree and some birds above ground
mainContentPages.title: Life On Land
mainContentPages.desc: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
